issue.title: [Python] Fix or ignore the test warnings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6674](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6674). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently when running the python tests, we have a bunch of warnings. Some of them can be ignored, some of them can be fixed. But it is better to do that explicitly, so that new warnings (which can be potentially important to see) get more attention.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6674?focusedCommentId=16937351) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5489
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5489>
